root: ^(There's a woman here! Maybe she knows why I'm here...)
^Oh, good. You're conscious. Took you long enough.
^Uh, hi? Were you waiting on me or something?
^Blake. Do you, uh, know where we are?
^I'm in the same boat as you. Woke up here. The door is locked.
^I'm guessing the kidnapper is waiting until you wake up before anything happens.
^Was it not the same for you? I got knocked unconcious and the next thing I know I woke up here.
^I see. Maybe they hit your head harder than they did mine.
^HE SAID "Hey I know we haven't spoken in awhile but I cant stop thinking about you-"
^THOMAS ALSO SAID "You are a really beautiful girl and-"
^Is this Thomas from the hidden mafia game? I didnt give him my number for crap like this. Ugh.
^Jellyfish, you have an internet connection right now?
^YOU WERE UNCONCIOUS SO I COULDN'T TELL YOU IN THE MOMENT.
^Please block Thomas when if we get out of here.
^As I was saying, we got kidnapped. I've already explored the room but feel free to do your own digging.
^I LOVE DIGGING! PLEASE LET ME DIG PLEASE LET ME BE USEFUL.
^Blake, something is bound to happen soon. Don't get too invested.
^(I need to look around for clues that can tell me why I'm here or where we are.)
